definition: to act blindly without thinking (idiom)
light/easy/gentle/soft/reckless/unimportant/frivolous/small in number/unstressed/neutral/to disparage
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
absurd/fantastic/presumptuous/rash
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Never make a move if you are merely optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 如果你只是樂觀而已，千萬不要輕舉妄動。

sentences.english: This is not a trivial matter,don't be indiscretion.
sentences.chinese: 這件事非同小可，不能輕舉妄動。

sentences.english: But the Japanese government did not dare to take any further action for fear of reaction from China.
sentences.chinese: 由於顧忌中國的反應，日本政府未敢輕舉妄動。

sentences.english: So much of that thing has been done by these reckless Abolitionists.
sentences.chinese: 那些輕舉妄動的廢奴派做得實在太過份了。

sentences.english: No money and no wise naturally we carefully offend.
sentences.chinese: 沒錢又沒見識的我們自然小心翼翼不敢輕舉妄動。

definition: lit. beat the grass to scare the snake (idiom)/fig. to inadvertently alert an enemy/to punish sb as a warning to others
to make prompt decisions (idiom)
to send (sb) away/to change the subject/to open (an umbrella etc)
to procrastinate/to stall for time/to filibuster
extreme joy turns to sorrow (idiom); Don't celebrate too soon, things could still go wrong!
to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
open the net on one side (idiom); let the caged bird fly/to give one's opponent a way out/lenient treatment
to obscure the facts (idiom); to mislead the public with prevarication and deliberate falsehoods
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
of unknown origin
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
to quit while one is ahead (idiom)/to know when to stop
to let emotions affect one's decisions
to learn a lesson from the mistakes of one's predecessor (idiom)
to exaggerate
to shift one's eyes/(fig.) to shift one's attention/to divert attention
